sentences.en: Felicity's bedroom was spartan but functional.
sentences.cn: 费莉西蒂的卧室很简朴，但非常实用。

sentences.en: Go tell Spartans , passerby , that here, by Spartan law, we lie.
sentences.cn: 过客啊,去告诉我们的斯巴达人, 我们矢忠死守, 在这里粉身碎骨.

sentences.en: Go tell the Spartans, passerby , that here, by Spartan law, we lie!
sentences.cn: 走,去告诉斯巴达人们, 过路人, 斯巴达的法律, 我们躺在这儿!

sentences.en: Humiliated before his Spartan army, Kratos dragged himself up from the dirt.
sentences.cn: 在自己的斯巴达军队面前颜面尽失, 奎托斯从地面上挣扎而起,蹒跚前行.

sentences.en: I have given you the last of my magic , Spartan.
sentences.cn: 但传说只要找到它就能获得惊人的力量.

sentences.en: Spartan King Leonidas: Give them nothing! But take from them everything!
sentences.cn: 斯巴达国王雷奥尼达: 不用给我甚麽! 但拿他们的所有!

sentences.en: Spartan King Leonidas: We Spartans have descended from Hercules himself.
sentences.cn: 斯巴达国王雷奥尼达: 我斯巴达人是[大力士]的后裔.

sentences.en: Spartan youths were bred as warriors.
sentences.cn: 斯巴达青年被培养成战士.

sentences.en: The glorious of Spartan? You did this for yourself.
sentences.cn: 斯巴达斯人的光荣? 你只是为了你自己!

sentences.en: The Spartan King Leonidas led the army to the pass at Thermopylae.
sentences.cn: 斯巴达国王里奥尼达斯率领军队前往塞莫皮莱隘口.

sentences.en: Their spartan lifestyle prohibits a fridge or a phone.
sentences.cn: 他们不使用冰箱和电话，过着简朴的生活。

sentences.en: Wave after wave of Persian attack would smash against Spartan shields.
sentences.cn: 波斯人一波又一波的进攻会被斯巴达人的盾牌粉碎.

sentences.en: When the glory of Spartan is known to the others.
sentences.cn: 当斯巴达斯的荣耀为世人所知!

sentences.en: When the glory of Spartan is none to other word.
sentences.cn: 当斯巴达斯的荣耀高于一切的时候!
年轻的斯巴达战士: 主人?

trans.tran_cn: 斯巴达的，斯巴达式的，纪律性强或严于自律的，简朴的，节约的，精炼的
trans.tran_en: can be used to describe conditions or ways of living that are simple and without any comfort
